meaningMnemonic: If you can <kanji>congratulate</kanji> someone for an <kanji>occurrence</kanji> in their life, it must be an <vocabulary>auspicious event</vocabulary>. You'll remember this happy event for a long, long time.
readingMnemonic: This is a jukugo word that uses the on'yomi readings of the kanji. You should be able to read this on your own.
